Quotes.quote_1: The difference between the novice and the master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried
Quotes.quote_2: There are two reasons a person feels the desire to teach something. Either he wants to pass on his successes or he wants to pass on his failures
Quotes.quote_3: In every time, in every world, the strong polish their fangs while the weak polish their wisdom

Post.Public_message: Your post will be setting default as public post. Click here if you want to change it to private. Remember only friend can see your private post on your's profile page
Post.Private_message: Your post is been setted as private post. It's only show on your profile page for your friends. Click here to change it to public so everyone can see

Notify.friend_request_1: You received a friend request from

Notify.post_ban: You have been locked from posting because we found that you violated community standards. Your entire post will be hidden.
